languages.text: The Grand Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 round, allies in that area gain +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, cannot be overpenetrated, gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effect, and gain +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against area attacks. Additionally, they do not suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} for receiving damage.
languages.original_text: Великий стратег выбирает одну из зон Стратегического плана. На 1 раунд союзники в этой зоне получают +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}. Против них не действует сквозное пробитие, а также они получают иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидыванию{/g} и +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} урона от атак по области. Кроме того, получая урон, они не получают {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранений{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 round, allies in that area gain +10+(Strategist's INT+FEL bonus)% armour and cannot be overpenetrated, gain immunity to the prone effect and +(Strategist's INT+FEL bonus)/2 deflection against area attacks. Additionally, they do not suffer injuries for receiving damage during one turn.

The Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 round, allies in that area gain +(10 + (Strategist's INT + FEL bonus)% armour, cannot be overpenetrated, gain immunity to the prone effect, and gain +((Strategist's INT + FEL bonus)/2) deflection against area attacks. Additionally, they do not suffer injuries for receiving damage.

The Grand Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 round, allies in that area gain +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, cannot be overpenetrated, gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effect, and gain +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against area attacks. Additionally, they do not suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} for receiving damage.

The Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, allies in that area gain +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, cannot be overpenetrated, gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}, and gain +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Additionally, they do not suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} for receiving damage.

The Grand Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 round, allies in that area gain +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, cannot be overpenetrated, gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effect, and gain +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against area attacks. Additionally, they do not suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} for receiving damage.

На 1 раунд союзники в этой зоне получают +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}. Против них не действует сквозное пробитие, а также они получают иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидыванию{/g} и +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} урона от атак по области. Кроме того, получая урон, они не получают {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранений{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, allies in that area gain +(10 + (Strategist's INT + FEL {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})% armour, cannot be overpenetrated, gain immunity to the prone effect, and gain +((Strategist's INT + FEL bonus)/2) deflection against area attacks. Additionally, they do not suffer injuries for receiving damage.

traits.locale_text: Стратег выбирает одну из зон Стратегического плана. На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} союзники в этой зоне получают +(10 + ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ИНТ + ОБЩ стратега)% к броне. Против них не действует сквозное пробитие, а также они получают иммунитет к опрокидыванию и +((бонус ИНТ + ОБЩ стратега) / 2) к отражению урона от атак по области. Кроме того, получая урон, они не получают ранений.

Стратег выбирает одну из зон Стратегического плана. На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} союзники в этой зоне получают +(10 + ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ИНТ + ОБЩ стратега)% к броне. Против них не действует сквозное пробитие, а также они получают иммунитет к опрокидыванию и +((бонус ИНТ + ОБЩ стратега) / 2) к отражению урона от атак по области. Кроме того, получая урон, они не получают ранений.

Стратег выбирает одну из зон Стратегического плана. На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} союзники в этой зоне получают +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}% к броне. Против них не действует сквозное пробитие, а также они получают иммунитет к опрокидыванию и +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} к отражению урона от атак по области. Кроме того, получая урон, они не получают ранений.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}选择一片战斗策略区域。在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，该区域内所有盟友获得+{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，无法被过度穿透，对{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}效果免疫，对抗{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时获得+{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。此外，所有盟友承受{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时都不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, allies in that area gain +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, cannot be overpenetrated, gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effect, and gain +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Additionally, they do not suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} for receiving {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 战略大师选择一片战斗策略区域。在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，该区域内所有盟友获得（10+（战略大师的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，无法被过度穿透，对俯卧效果免疫，对抗{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时获得+（（战略大师的智力+社交加值）/2）{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。此外，所有盟友受到伤害时不会获得伤势。

战略大师选择一片战斗策略区域。在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，该区域内所有盟友获得{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，无法被过度穿透，对俯卧效果免疫，对抗{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时获得+{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。此外，所有盟友受到伤害时不会获得伤势。

languages.text: El gran estratega elige una de las zonas designadas por Tácticas de combate. Durante 1 asalto, los aliados presentes en esa zona ganan un +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}, se vuelven inmunes a la sobrepenetración y al {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribo{/g} y ganan +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} contra ataques de área. Además, no sufren {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g} al recibir daños.
languages.original_text: The Grand Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 round, allies in that area gain +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, cannot be overpenetrated, gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effect, and gain +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against area attacks. Additionally, they do not suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} for receiving damage.

traits.locale_text: El gran {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}estratega{/g} elige una de las zonas designadas por Tácticas de combate. Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, los aliados presentes en esa zona ganan un +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}, se vuelven inmunes a la sobrepenetración y al {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribo{/g} y ganan +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} contra {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}. Además, no sufren {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g} al recibir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daños{/g}.

El estratega elige una de las zonas designadas por Tácticas de combate. Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, los aliados presentes en esa zona ganan un +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}, se vuelven inmunes a la sobrepenetración y al derribo y ganan +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} contra {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}. Además, no sufren lesiones al recibir daños.

languages.text: Der Großstratege wählt eines der Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiete aus. Eine Runde lang erhalten Verbündete in diesem Gebiet +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}. Darüber hinaus werden Überdurchdringungen unmöglich, sie sind immun gegen den {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g}-Effekt und erlangen +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} gegen Flächenangriffe. Sie erleiden außerdem keine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g}, wenn ihnen Schaden zugefügt wird.
languages.original_text: The Grand Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 round, allies in that area gain +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, cannot be overpenetrated, gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effect, and gain +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against area attacks. Additionally, they do not suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} for receiving damage.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} wählt eines der Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiete aus. Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang erhalten Verbündete in diesem Gebiet +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}. Darüber hinaus werden Überdurchdringungen unmöglich, sie sind immun gegen den {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g}-Effekt und erlangen +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g}. Sie erleiden außerdem keine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g}, wenn ihnen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt wird.

Der Stratege wählt eines der Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiete aus. Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang erhalten Verbündete in diesem Gebiet +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}. Darüber hinaus werden Überdurchdringungen unmöglich, sie sind immun gegen den Hinstreckungseffekt und erlangen +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g}. Sie erleiden im Schadensfall außerdem keinen Verletzungen.

languages.text: Le grand stratège choisit l'une des zones de Tactiques de combat. Pendant 1 round, les alliés présents dans cette zone bénéficient de +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}, ne peuvent pas être victimes d'une surpénétration, sont invulnérables à l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et acquièrent +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} contre les attaques de zone. En outre, aucune {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion{/g} ne leur est infligée lorsqu'ils subissent des dégâts.
languages.original_text: The Grand Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 round, allies in that area gain +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, cannot be overpenetrated, gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effect, and gain +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against area attacks. Additionally, they do not suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} for receiving damage.

traits.locale_text: Le Stratège choisit l'une des zones de Tactiques de Combat. Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, les alliés présents dans cette zone bénéficient de +(10 + ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Stratège) % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}, ne peuvent pas être victimes d'une surpénétration, sont invulnérables à l'effet Immobilisation et acquièrent +((bonus d'INT + FRA du Stratège) / 2) de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} contre les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g}. En outre, aucune blessure ne leur est infligée lorsqu'ils subissent des dégâts.

Le Stratège choisit l'une des zones de Tactiques de Combat. Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, les alliés présents dans cette zone bénéficient de +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}, ne peuvent pas être victimes d'une surpénétration, sont invulnérables à l'effet Immobilisation et acquièrent +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} contre les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g}. En outre, aucune blessure ne leur est infligée lorsqu'ils subissent des dégâts.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}は軍略範囲をひとつ選択する。1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、範囲内の味方は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}%され、過貫通を受けず、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}効果を無効化し、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}が+{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}される。さらに、被{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を受けない。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, allies in that area gain +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, cannot be overpenetrated, gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effect, and gain +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Additionally, they do not suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} for receiving {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦略家は軍略範囲をひとつ選択する。1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、範囲内の味方は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+(10 + (戦略家の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})%され、過貫通を受けず、脆弱化効果を無効化し、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}が+((戦略家のINT + FEL ボーナス)/2)される。さらに、被ダメージによる負傷を受けない。

戦略家は軍略範囲をひとつ選択する。1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、範囲内の味方は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}%され、過貫通を受けず、脆弱化効果を無効化し、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}が+{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}される。さらに、被ダメージによる負傷を受けない。

languages.text: Büyük Stratejist, Çatışma Taktikleri alanlarından birini seçer. O alandaki dost birimler, 1 rauntluğuna +%{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} edinirler; delip geçme ile {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g} etkilerine karşı bağışıklık kazanırlar ve alan saldırılarına karşı +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} elde ederler. Ayrıca, aldıkları hasardan dolayı {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlıklara{/g} maruz kalmazlar.

For 1 round, allies in that area gain +{uip|BonusArmour|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, cannot be overpenetrated, gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effect, and gain +{uip|BonusDeflection|111f6e8111ae4d30a9d5d6d06027281d} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against area attacks. Additionally, they do not suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} for receiving damage.
